metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6508 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Puppet Enterprise 2017.3.x prior to 2017.3.3 are vulnerable to a remote execution bug when a specially crafted string was passed into the facter_task or puppet_conf tasks. This vulnerability only affects tasks in the affected modules, if you are not using puppet tasks you are not affected by this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: puppet-module-puppetlabs-apache: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
puppet-module-puppetlabs-apt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
puppet-module-puppetlabs-mysql: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
